dc_title_s: Map showing change in white and non-white population in Hyde Park, 1950-1956 /map prepared by Sol Tax for paper on problems of the local community, given Feb. 4, 1957; data from urban renewal survey, N.O.R.C., & Chic. Community Inventory.
dc_description_s: Shows ethnic change by block.; Scale [ca. 1:5,800]; ms., color; Master and use copy. Digital master created according to Benchmark for Faithful Reproductions of Monographs and Serials, Version 1. Digital Library Federation, December 2002.
dct_isPartOf_sm: University of Chicago Social Science Maps
dct_spatial_sm: Hyde Park, Chicago, Illinois, United States
